Welcome to TaxiTripPackage’s documentation!

Plugins package

Module contents

Error Handling :

class plugins.ErrorHandler.ErrorHandler(track_reporter: NotificationReporter | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

ErrorHandler is the main class used for this module

handle_error(func)[source]

handle_error is the function that will be used as a decorator to handle errors in a custom way.

Parameters:

  • self (ErrorHandler) – The object itself.

  • func (function) – The function to be decorated.

Returns:

The decorated function.

Return type:

function

set_track_reporter(args: list) → None[source]

set_track_reporter is a tricky function, it’s will set the track_reporter object from the function args which is going to be the class itself, this is used to avoid passing the track_reporter from step to step.

Parameters:

args – function inputs, most of case will be (self,…) and we will only get the self class

Notification Reporter :

class plugins.NotifcationReporter.NotificationReporter(stream_id, index_name='traffic_processing_tracker')[source]

Bases: object

NotificationReporter is used to report into SQS queue to publish into socketIO microservices to be consumed by the front-end and insert into OS index to vizualise in Kibana.

publish_to_sqs(message)[source]

Publish message to SQS queue.

Parameters:

message (str) – Message to publish.

Returns:

True if success else False.

Taxi Traffic Processor :

src.TaxiTrafficProcessor.MY_ERROR_HANDLER = <plugins.ErrorHandler.ErrorHandler object>

TaxiTrafficProcessor

class src.TaxiTrafficProcessor.TaxiTrafficProcessor(_data_df: DataFrame, zone_brodcast: Broadcast, _track_reporter: NotificationReporter)[source]

Bases: object

This Class will be responsible for processing the data of the taxi traffic received on the streaming server.

get_data()[source]

Method to get the data.

pipeline_01() → bool[source]

Method to apply the first pipeline of the data.

Apply Pipeline 01 over _data_df and return the status of the operation.

1- Get Pickup/Drop Zone names from id. 2- Compute trip duration.

process_data() → None[source]

Method to process the data.

To scale with the data pre-processing, please add more pipelines here.

zone_brodcast: Broadcast

CassandraHandler :

class src.CassandraHandler.CassandraWriter[source]

Bases: object

This class will be responsible for writing the data into Cassandra.

write_to_cassandra(data: DataFrame) → bool[source]

Insert the data into Cassandra.

Parameters: data : SparkDataFrame : The data to be inserted into Cassandra.

Returns: status : bool : The status of the operation.
